ahk2.autolibinclude: Provide completion and automatic include from User and Standard library, Local library
ahk2.defaultdebugger: Set the default debugger when there are multiple debuggers
ahk2.interpreterpath: The path of the AutoHotkey.exe executable file. This default setting is used as a fallback if no interpreter is selected for the workspace. The extension will also not set nor change the value of this setting, it will only read from it.
